attributes.action: Stop the cancellation of local elections
attributes.additional_details: This is anti-democratic and will prevent up to 9 million people from exercising their constitutional right to vote.
attributes.background: Stop the government from reforming local government thus suspending the right to vote in local elections in 2025.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
